pageContent: Background: Factors associated with being hospitalized with indications of prostate cancer were examined. A secondary analysis of the older men in the Longitudinal Study on Aging (LSOA) used baseline (1984) interview data and Medicare hospital claims for 1984 through 1991.

metaData.source:
Nocardia farcinica masquerading as intracerebral metastases in advanced metastatic prostatic cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32900716/
